import React from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; function Pomodoro({ isTimerRunning, focusTime, setFocusTime, breakTime, setBreakTime, sessionType, sessionTime, playPause, stopTimer }) { return (
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusTime)}
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
); } export default Pomodoro;
